plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is fantasy, their favourite kind of plot is character-driven, their favourite setting is a fictional world, their favourite writing style is descriptive and lyrical, their favourite length is novel-length, their favourite topic is mythology and religion, their favourite pacing is slow and atmospheric, their favourite narrative structure is third-person omniscient, and their favourite themes are self-discovery, spiritual growth, and the intersection of the mundane and the magical.
